page.title: 04HISTORY OF GLENROTHES
page.content: IT WAS THERE ON THE 30 JUNE 1955 THAT THE QUEEN PAID A VIST.SCHOOLS WERE OF MAJOR IMPORTANCE IN GLENROTHES AS THE POPULATION HAD A YOUTHFUL BULDGE. CARELTON PRIMARY SCHOOL WAS THE FIRST SCHOOL COMPLETED AND IN 1954 AUCHMUTY HIGH SHOOL WAS ERECTED.RECREATIONAL FACILITIES PROVIDED A PROBLEM FOR THE GLENROTHES DEVELOPMENT CORPORATION (GDC),AND IN 1953 THE "GLENROTHES RECREATIONAL FACILITIES ADVISORY COMMITTEE"WAS SET UP.ITS FIRST SUCCESS WAS THE "CISWO" WHICH WAS OFFICALLY OPENED IN FEBRUARY 1959 AND THIS CONTAINED A BOWLING GREEN AND A TENNIS COURT.DURING THE YEARS BETWEEN 1953-54 IT WAS FEARED THAT THE POPULATION WOULD BE LESS THAN 18,000 AND THESE FEARS WRE STRENGTHENED BY THE NCB'S DECISION TO HALT THEIR DEVELOPMENT OF ROTHES COLLIERY UNTIL 1956.
